name: Meditative Typer
description:
Controls: Type along with the text onscreen

Platforms: tested on chrome and firefox, macos

-------

Hello and welcome to Meditative Typer, a Guided Meditation experience. 

Thank you so much for choosing us for your meditative meanderings. Our crack team of professional meditation scientists have developed a truly magnificent program, leveraging machine learning and AI-assisted monitoring of your heart rate, breathing, and O2 levels, leading to a perfectly personalized meditation event that is different every time.

--------

Expected playthrough: tutorial, free typing, guided 1,2,3,4,5, then come back and play free typing every few days for the rest of your life.

Made for GDEX 2020 Game Jam
